description: Even though reporting VCPU is optional, starting with Pike, due to code at https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/10661dc5e2e3f2e2f37b6a86ea22f71b4b833fc9/nova/virt/ironic/driver.py#L762 nodes without VCPU are not recognized. This has to be changes to properly call _node_resources_unavailable instead.
title: Ironic node cannot be used if it does not report VCPU

comments.content: Even though reporting VCPU is optional, starting with Pike, due to code at https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/10661dc5e2e3f2e2f37b6a86ea22f71b4b833fc9/nova/virt/ironic/driver.py#L762 nodes without VCPU are not recognized. This has to be changes to properly call _node_resources_unavailable instead.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~divius

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
